entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
